    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddCommand
    Handles adding new categories or appliances to the system.
    AddCommandTest
    Unit tests for AddCommand.
    Appliance
    Represents a single electrical appliance with its basic properties.
    ApplianceManager
    Manages appliances grouped by categories.
    ClsCommand
    Clears the console screen.
    Command
    Represents a generic command that can be executed by the system.
    CommandRegistry
    Stores and manages all available commands in the system.
    EditCommand
    Handles editing of appliances or categories.
    EditCommandTest
    Unit tests for EditCommand.
    ErrorMailer
    Sends error reports by email using the Gmail SMTP server.
    ExitCommand
    Exits the application safely.
    FindCommand
    Handles search operations for appliances.
    FindCommandTest
    Unit tests for FindCommand.
    HelpCommand
    Displays a list of all available commands and their descriptions.
    LoadCommand
    Loads appliance data from a JSON file and restores it into the system.
    LogCommand
    Displays the content of the application log file.
    LogService
    Service class for centralized application logging.
    LsCommand
    Lists categories or appliances based on user-specified flags.
    Main
    Entry point of the Home Appliances app.
    PlugCommand
    Manages appliance power connections.
    PlugCommandTest
    Unit tests for PlugCommand.
    RmCommand
    Removes categories or appliances from the system.
    RmCommandTest
    Unit tests for RmCommand.
    SaveCommand
    Saves all appliance data to a JSON file.
    SortCommand
    Sorts appliances by power in descending order.
    SortCommandTest
    Unit test for SortCommand.
    TotalCommand
    Displays the total power consumption of all plugged appliances.
    TotalCommandTest
    Unit test for TotalCommand.
    VersionCommand
    Displays the current program version information.
